name: Serval Systems
tag_list: it-support, it-services, managed-it, outsourced-it, remote-support, backup-support, it-security, remote-backup, online-backup, disaster-recovery, cloud-computing, network-cabling, anti-virus-solutions, backup-solutions, thin-client-technology, server-virt
overview:
Serval Systems offer a wide range of IT services in Sussex, Kent and Surrey from our offices in East Grinstead.

Services offered include:

Cloud Computing IP Telephone Systems Business IT Services Network Cabling and Equipment Anti-virus Solutions Backup Solutions Data Replication and High Availability Email Filtering Solutions Thin Client Technology Server Virtualisation

Serval Systems aims to help you and your business succeed by supplying the IT systems, services and support that are right for your business needs. We have a track record of delivering successful projects and outsourced support while helping our clients achieve their goals, whether they are looking at reducing costs or managing their growth.
